snippet: The opening of the Brand Studio reflects how much the distinctions among agencies in marketing services are blurring.
abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column notes United Talent Agency is opening a division named the Brand Studio at UTA; observes the division's opening reflects how the distinctions among agencies in marketing services are blurring.

byline.contributor: Brooks Barnes and Michael Cieply contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The opening of the Brand Studio reflects how much the distinctions among agencies in marketing services are blurring.

headline.seo: United Talent Agency Adds Brand Strategy Unit
headline.main: Talent Agency Adds Brand Strategy Unit
headline.print_headline: Talent Agency Adds Brand Strategy Unit
